article_title: UN halts Rafah food distribution due to shortages and hostilities
sentence: Israel  launched  a  military  campaign  to  destroy  Hamas  in  response  to  the  group's  cross-border  attack  on  southern  Israel  on  7  October,  during  which  about  1,200  people  were  killed  and  252  others  were  taken  hostage.

sentence: More  than  35,640  people  have  been  killed  in  Gaza  since  then,  according  to  the  territory's  Hamas-run  health  ministry.
